options.name: Custom Menus
options.description:
Changes whether or not the V.S. Impostor menus will be
displayed instead of the normal base game menus.

options.name: NMV FPS Display
options.description: Changes whether or not the FPS counter should look like the Nightmare Vision variant.

options.name: Ranks Instead of Accuracy
options.description:
Changes whether or not ranks will be displayed
instead of accuracy during gameplay.
